name: quickmenu
description: The new era of mobile navigation for the web, we're out of hamburgers.

scripts.watch: concurrently "./node_modules/.bin/babel src -d dist --watch --source-maps --out-file-extension .min.js" "node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/ -wo dist/css/"
scripts.build: (babel src -d dist --source-maps --out-file-extension .min.js) && (node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true src/scss/quickmenu.scss dist/css/quickmenu.min.css)

author: Arif Ullah
